bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with ru yong 乳癰 , breast obstruction-illness. Tai ping hui min he ji Recipe book. Northern Song, ju fang 1107~1110. 太平惠民和劑局方 8: 神效托裏 散，治癰疽發背、腸癰、奶癰 , “The ‘wondrously effective powder to support the interior’ cures obstruction-illnesses and impediment - illnesses and effusion of the back, intestinal abscesses, as well as breast obstruction-illness ”.
